TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_tongan, title = tongan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/tongan} }

S.FORM: alang tongan ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Nin'ay go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 278 buwan, 952 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 841 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 111 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Setik 71%, Tayan 9%, Amis 2%, Bunun 3%, Paywan 1%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na tongan hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na tongan hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na tongan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na tongan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na tongan hya' ga pulan. tay 'llaw na tongan hya' ga snuwing. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang tongan ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Nin'ay go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 278 bowan, 952 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 841 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 111 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Setik 71%, Tayan 9%, Amis 2%, Bonon 3%, Paywan 1%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na tongan hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na tongan hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na tongan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na tongan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na tongan hya' ga polan. tay 'llaw na tongan hya' ga snowing. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
